articles.title: Bill O’Brien replenishes BC’s football roster with 27 mid-year transfers
articles.description:
In a span of two weeks earlier this month, Boston College football welcomed 45 potential transfers to campus. The staff hosted the players and their families, showed them around and shared what the program had to offer, and discussed a potential future in Chestnut Hill. “It’s like speed dating,” said BC head coach Bill O’Brien. […]
